text: Meera Deosthale is an Indian television actress known for portraying Chakor in Colors TV's Udaan. == Early life == While in school, Deosthale was a state- level basketball player and focused on sports, later moving to Mumbai with her mother when she developed an interest in being an actress and finished school. == Career == Deosthale made her television debut with Colors TV's Sasural Simar Ka as Priya. Next, she played Eshu in Dilli Wali Thakur Gurls and appeared in Zindagi Wins. From 2016 to 2019, she played Chakor Rajvanshi in Colors TV's Udaan. She quit the show in March 2019 and was replaced by Toral Rasputra. In September 2019, Deosthale began portraying Vidya in Colors TV's Vidya opposite Namish Taneja until the series went off air in April 2020. == Television == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !
